title: Saint Patrick's Day
description: Who was Saint Patrick? Why is there a day for people to celebrate him? Why do people wear green on Saint Patrick's Day? This book will answer these questions and more. It tells the history of a man named Patrick, how he helped the people of Ireland, why we celebrate on March 17, and how many people all over the world enjoy the festive holiday.
